data.name: Sexy_Primes
data.description: Given a Range Of the form [L, R] , The Task is to Return all ```The Sexy Prime Pairs ``` in the range in increasing Order. ``` Sexy Primes are prime numbers that differ from each other by six. For Example, The numbers 5 and 11 are both Sexy primes, Because they differ by 6 . ``` # *** Notes :: *** ``` 1- The Function should return a Vector of Pairs , like the format : {{11,17},{13,19}} . 2- The range's boundaries [L:R] will always positives , L > 0 , and R > 0 . 3- The range's boundaries [L:R] are inclusive , [L:R] is a closed interval . If any of the previous points is not Clear , Just pay attention to The Examples clarify everything . ``` # ** Input :: Output Examples :: ** ```cpp 1- sexyPrimes ([1:15]) return {{5,11},{7,13}} . Explanation :: Input : L = 1, R = 15 . Output : {{5,11},{7,13}} . Because each pair's numbers differ from Each Other By Six , as in the first pair the absolute differece between (5) and (11) is (6) , in the second pair the absolute differece between (7) and (13) is (6) ,and they in increasing Order. 2- sexyPrimes ([11:19]) return {{11,17),(13,19}} . Explanation :: Input : L = 11, R = 19 . Output : {{11,17),(13,19}} . Because each pair's numbers differ from Each Other By Six , as in the first pair the absolute differece between (11) and (17) is (6) , in the second pair the absolute differece between (13) and (16) is (6) ,and they in increasing Order. 3- sexyPrimes ([1:30]) return {{5,11},{7,13},{11,17},{13,19},{17,23},{23,29}} . Explanation :: Input : L = 1, R = 30 . Output : {{5,11},{7,13},{11,17},{13,19},{17,23},{23,29}} . Because each pair's numbers differ from Each Other By Six , as in the first pair the absolute differece between (5) and (11) is (6) , in the second pair the absolute differece between (7) and (13) is (6) ,and so on .. , they in increasing Order. ``` If you feel Enjoyed this Kata , Then How About (Monkey With) in this # ** Numbers Series ** Balanced Number STRNOGN - Strong Number Disarium Number Jumping Number Special Number Automorphic_Number Hope you enjoy it .. Awaiting for crafting best Practice and Clever Codes .. ``` ALL Translation are Welcomed (In Any Language )``` Enjoy Learning !!! ``` Zizou ```
